mapper.insert: insert into bookorder(id, total, name, address_code, address_juso, address_detail, pay_type, etc, order_status) values(#{id}, #{total}, #{name}, #{addressCode}, #{addressJuso}, #{addressDetail}, #{payType}, #{etc}, "결제완료");
mapper.update: update bookorder set order_status="주문취소" where ono=#{ono};
mapper.select: select a.ono, total, order_date, order_status from ( select ono from bookorder order by ono desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty} ) a left join bookorder b on a.ono = b.ono
